title: Am I addicted to email?
description: This will tell you how often you check your inbox, how much time you spend composing messages, how many pages of email you write, and how you compare to others.

title: Am I addicted to social networks?
description: This will tell you how much time you spend on Facebook, how many times you visit it a day, how much you write, comment on, and like posts, and how often you send messages.

title: How popular am I?
description: This will tell you how much online communications you get (personal emails, instant messages) and how you compare to others.

title: Who is more sexist: me or my friends?
description: This will tell you how frequently you use and encounter gender-biased words, and how you compare to your Facebook friends and to others.

title: Who is more racist: me or my friends?
description: This will tell you how frequently you use and encounter race-related words, and how you compare to your Facebook friends and to others.

title: How fake is my Facebook profile?
description: This will tell you about how your set of likes on Facebook compare to what you actually spend your time online on.

title: How stereotypical are my interests?
description: This will tell you which of your interests are most stereotypical and least stereotypical, based on your age, ethnicity, profession, and country of origin.

title: How much do I contribute to the internet?
description: This will tell you how much text you contributed to the internet, compared to how much you read, and how you compare to others.

title: How much time do I spend slacking off?
description: This will tell you how much of your time online is spent on leisure-related sites vs work-related sites, where you spend your time slacking off, and how you compare to others.

title: What dialect of English do I most resemble?
description: This will tell you which dialect of English the text you type online most resembles.

title: Which words do I overuse?
description: This will tell you which words you tend to overuse in your email and instant messages, and how you compare to others.

title: How sophisticated is the language I read and write online?
description: This will tell you the grade level at which you write English in your email, in instant messages, and in comments, as well as the grade level of the text you read online.

title: How smart am I compared to my Facebook friends?
description: This will tell you the grade level at which your friends write, in their Facebook posts and in instant messages they write to you, and how it compares to the grade level at which you write.

title: How smart am I compared to my colleagues?
description: This will tell you the grade level of the emails which your email contacts write emails to you, and how it compares to the grade level at which you write emails.

title: How multicultural am I?
description: This will tell you how much of your interests are uncharacteristic of your home country, and how you compare to others.

title: Which foreign countries do my interests best match?
description: This will tell you which foreign countries’ characteristic interests most closely match the interests you pursue online.

title: Which professions do my interests best match?
description: This will tell you which professions’ characteristic interests most closely match the interests you pursue online.
